name: Cheese-Stuffed Mini Meatballs
description: A sweet and garlicky appy with a surprise centre! These will be the first dish gone at your next potluck event. Dish up with Roasted Garlic Aioli for dunking.

ingredients.name: Honey Garlic Meatball Seasoning or Sweet Garlic Chicken Seasoning
soft goat cheese or cream cheese

preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.

In a large bowl, crumble in ground meat; add seasoning. Mix well. Using 1 tbsp as a guide, form meatballs; place on pan. Flatten slightly into discs and put about 1⁄2 tsp cheese in the centre of each disc. Reshape into a ball, sealing meat around cheese.
In a bowl, melt honey in the microwave for about 20 sec.
Brush meatballs with melted honey. Bake until cooked through, about 10 min.
Insert a toothpick into each ball—they’ll be easier for guests to pick up.
tips: Try flavoured goat cheese, such as cranberry or herbed.
